name: A very simple boilerplate for AngularJS apps
tagline: A basic structure to get started with AngularJS apps.
body: # The very simple ng boilerplate ## About The goal is to have a basic structure to get started with AngularJS apps. Enjoy! ## What is it? Kickstart any AngularJS application without repeating yourself on basic tasks giving you freedom to extend the way you want/need. ## How to use it? Clone this repo, delete .git and go make some apps. ## Do you need a simple http server? A simple zero-configuration command-line http server: [http-server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/http-server) Follow @rpancini Tweet
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
